body.content:
Dear Lucy,

Thank you so much for your understanding in this matter. You may not
understand the relief you have just afforded myself and my family.
Basically, everything that concerns us is practically being monitored and
as such we are taking extreme measures to take absolute precautions
otherwise our lives will be in serious danger.

 I have confidently and successfully deposited the sum of US 20 Million
since June 17 2018 I made this funds through oil contracts with some
Russian oil companies operating in my country but I was forced to move the
funds out of my country due to this problems this funds will cover the fee
for the purchase of the home I intended buying and a good investment. Once
we arrive in your country the remaining funds will be used for the welfare
of my family and for the investments purposes which I will require your
full assistance and guidance as soon as we arrive in your country.

The funds were deposited in Europe on my behalf through the help of a
Russian oil contractor who was part of the board of one of the companies
that did business with my country BELARUS from 2013 to early 2020. He moved
the funds for me using his company's name and deposited it in a vault with
a security and deposit company in the United Kingdom. Considering the
restriction on monetary policy in my country BELARUS it is impossible to
transfer funds with your name out of the country.

This restriction will make it difficult for me to transfer the funds from
BELARUS here to your country. These funds are the only funds left for me
and my family and I trust and believe that it will be safe once you receive
it. I have reposed my trust and confidence in you regarding this. I assure
you that you will never regret doing it for us.

On this matter I will greatly appreciate that you immediately forward to me
your personal or company details as earlier demanded that I will in turn
send to the management consultants in Europe to make my portfolio available
for you for onward transmission and total settlement in your country.

This will afford me the process to begin in earnest. please see below for
the requirements.

1. FULL NAME/COMPANY NAMES
2. CONTACT ADDRESS
3. PRIVATE TELEPHONE NUMBER

Thank you so much my dear brother.

Best regards
Irina A. Kostevich.
